name: Roboto Templates
description:
Templates to use on social media and promote Robotos.


See tutorial:

https://www.loom.com/share/0de440c72c7f4b5d8b0ca33ebc73f6f7


How to:

  1. Go to https://www.robotos.art/your-stuff and connect a wallet with a Roboto.
  2. Select a Roboto and click on it.
  3. Scroll down to the Transparent Head PNG image.
  4. Right-click and select Copy Image.
  5. Come back to this file.
  6. Press CMD and hold while you click on the image of the right.
  7. Press CMD+V (paste) and see how your Roboto appears on every template.
  8. Select any of the templates and Export (bottom-right option)


Thank you!
